DOC.brief_summary: This non-randomized , phase 1 , study primary objective determine toxicity establish maximum tolerate dose ALIMTA administer 10 minute infusion every 21 day folic acid multi-vitamin supplementation therapy lightly heavily pre-treated patient locally advanced metastatic cancer .
